name: Drawing of the Last Breath
description:
CONTENT WARNING: BODY HORROR

Inscribed in a dark altar, they find an unreadable sigil. For one with Eyes of the Runekeeper, for whom written language holds no mystery, this is baffling. Maddening. K'Thriss searches far and wide to uncover more of these Tetrathanotica, four strokes that convey the meaning of that which is seen Beyond, at the moment of death.

Drawing of the Last Breath is a fan project curated to your refined taste. In this twin-stick 2D action platformer made with Godot Engine, you go on a quest for knowledge as beloved character K'Thriss Drow'b.*  It was released on PC for Windows and Linux on Thursday 17 September 17:17 (CET) on your favorite games web store, itch(.io); just like it had always been prophesized.

This game offers controller support, playing it with a keyboard is what connoiseurs like to call "analogue hard mode".

If you want to be among the first to know when we release a new game you can always subscribe to our newsletter.

*K'Thriss Drow'b is played by Kris Straub on the DnD podcast Acquisitions Incorporated: the C Team. Check out more of this beloved franchise here!
